long_description: The Victorinox Deluxe Concealed security belt keeps your valuables close and concealed for worry-free transport while traveling. Security belt tucks under clothes to secure valuables; front side is made from a polyester/cotton blend, with a soft, brushed nylon on the back side for next-to-skin comfort. Elastic waist strap adjusts to nearly any size and secures with a locking clip. 2 large zippered pockets store tickets, passports, travelers checks and most sizes of currency.
short_description: The Victorinox Deluxe Concealed security belt keeps your valuables close and concealed for worry-free transport while traveling.
